spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall room layout roughly matches (bedroom top-left, living/dining center-left, kitchen/utility right, toilet between). Major dimensional/proportion drift: foyer labeled 4'9"x3'0" in 3D vs 4'6"x3'10" in plan (E4); toilet labeled ~4'8"x6'0" in 3D vs 4'9"x8'0" in plan, significantly shortening the room (E4). Door placement/orientation is inconsistent: main entry/foyer boundary treatment and interior door swings do not consistently match the 2D swing directions and locations (E2/E3). Window placements are not faithfully mapped: 3D shows large exterior glazing on faces that do not match the plan’s smaller window positions and counts (E2/E4).

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency relationships are mostly preserved (living connects to bedroom/toilet; kitchen connects to utility; balcony off living). Wall thickness is inconsistent between exterior and interior partitions compared to the plan (E4). The OTS/shaft indicated near the toilet in the 2D plan is not clearly present in the 3D model (E1). Several openings/doors appear embedded differently than the plan (alignment to wall segments and swing depiction) (E2/E3). No extra rooms are added, but multiple window elements appear exaggerated beyond plan intent (borderline hallucinated glazing magnitude) (E5/E4).

furniture_mapping.notes: Bedroom bed/wardrobe placement is broadly consistent with the plan. Living/dining furniture mapping is not faithful: the dining table/chairs arrangement does not match the 2D layout (shape/position), and overall furniture scale (especially dining element) looks oversized relative to circulation clearances (E2/E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric viewpoint is clear and visually readable; lighting is clean and geometry is mostly crisp. However, glazing scale and some wall/door detailing look stylized rather than plan-accurate, and the projection feels more perspective-isometric than strict architectural orthographic (minor) (E6).

detected_errors.description: Toilet proportions incorrect: 3D shows ~4'8"x6'0" vs plan 4'9"x8'0" (room length significantly reduced).
Foyer dimensions/proportions incorrect: 3D label 4'9"x3'0" vs plan 4'6"x3'10".
OTS/shaft element adjacent to the toilet (shown in 2D plan) is not clearly modeled/present in the 3D render.
Window placement/count mismatch: 3D exterior windows do not correspond to the plan’s window positions and appear redistributed across facades.
Window scale distortion: 3D uses large floor-to-ceiling style glazing that exceeds the plan’s implied window sizes.
Several door locations/opening extents do not align precisely with the plan’s wall segments (notably around foyer-to-living/kitchen junction).
Door swing/orientation depiction differs from the 2D plan for interior doors (toilet/bedroom/foyer transitions).
Wall thickness consistency differs from plan intent (interior partitions appear variably thick in 3D).
Living/dining furniture arrangement (dining table/chairs) is misplaced compared to the 2D plan layout.
